extendedInfo.description: Fine Lines Lingerie Bra Fitting & SizeHi and welcome to the Fine Lines Lingerie Bra Fitting & Size app ... your virtual fitting room!I am Renee from Bra Queen and I am here in the Fine Lines Lingerie Bra Fitting Room to give you everything you need to find the perfect bra for you.Here at Fine Lines and Bra Queen we are passionate about women finding not only their bra size but the right shape bra, one that is going to work for you and your body. We always recommend you get fitted by a Professional Bra Fitter but we also understand that not everyone has the ability to access a Professional Bra Fitter, therefore in the app we have included:Videos - We take you step by step and show you how to find your bra size, what a good fitting bra is suppose to look like and how to find the right shape bra for you and your body. Bra Sizing - We show you how to measure and then calculateyour bra size, with Australian & International sizings.International Comparison Sizing - We have provided 	information to show comparison sizing for Australia, USA, UK & EU sizes.Fitting & Shape - We answer your questions about fitting, sizing & shape, as well as a gallery of the current Fine Linesâ collection.Stockists - You will find a list of Fine Linesâ Australian stockists and their locations.Canât find what you need in the app ... simply âAsk Fine Linesâ.See you in the fitting room!
